page.title: 02ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content:
A group of about 12 women meet weekly in each other's houses to practise various crafts. There are spinners and weavers using wool from their own sheep, embroiderers, quilters, knitters and dress makers.
CLUBS. Most of the local clubs meet in The Meon Hall, which is the village hall for the three villages and situated by the recreation ground in Meonstoke. At present there are the following clubs:Keep Fit, Badminton, Natural History, Riverside Players (amateur dramatics), Darby and Joan, Meonstoke, Exton and Corhampton W.I., Meonwara W.I., Mother's Union, Yoga and Mothers and Toddlers Group.
